stories.text:
Electric.ai|Staff Engineer|Full-time|NYC or REMOTE

Electric is the industry leader in providing world-class IT technology and real-time support for small and mid-sized businesses. With over 400 customers and more than 30,000 employee end-users, Electric’s IT platform includes: real-time support powered by 130+ IT technicians, security, device & inventory management, network & server management, application & cloud management, employee on-boarding and off-boarding, procurement & provisioning, and data monitoring & insights. Electric is a Series C company funded by an all-star team of investors.

As Staff Engineer, you will oversee major development projects, guiding multiple teams to optimal engineering choices. You will be a leading voice in designing and improving our architecture. You will ensure our success and help us deliver valuable services that are also reliable, scalable, and of high quality. Reporting into the SVP of Engineering, you’ll have direct access to business needs and strategy, and help our engineering organization execute with great success.

Job Post: https://www.electric.ai/company/job-openings?gh_jid=5327789002

About our Eng teams: https://workdna.com/electric/engineering

We're also hiring:

Analytics Engineer| https://www.electric.ai/company/job-openings?gh_jid=5331328002

Sr. Backend Engineer| https://www.electric.ai/company/job-openings?gh_jid=5000798002

SRE/Sr. SRE| https://www.electric.ai/company/job-openings?gh_jid=5121639002

Engineering Manager| https://www.electric.ai/company/job-openings?gh_jid=4945483002
